v8:item.v8:content: Has extensions that change the data structure
Extensions that change the data structure are found. Cannot create a standalone workstation.

To create a standalone workstation, delete extensions that change the application structure. Note that the data added by the extensions will be permanently deleted along with them. Therefore, we recommend that you back up before deletion.
Extensions that change the data structure
To enable a standalone mode, 1C:Enterprise platform 8.3 must be installed on your computer.
How to install or update 1C:Enterprise platform
Click Next to configure standalone mode parameters.
For example, "To work at home" or "Business trip to partner."
<All data is available in standalone workstation.>
The specified users can synchronize data with any standalone workstations and other applications.
Click Create to prepare data for import.
Preparing data for import to your computer. It might take several minutes. Please wait…

If errors occur when downloading a file using the web client, try to use 1C:Enterprise thin client. To use the thin client, read the <link ThinClientSetupGuideAddress>instruction</> or contact administrator.
How to set up standalone workstations
An error occurred while creating a standalone workstation.
To deal with and fix the issue, please contact the technical support. When contacting the technical support, attach the error text below.
How to set up standalone workstations
Extensions that change the data structure
How to install or update 1C:Enterprise platform
